results.title: Management in hospital
results.brief_description:
Episode number 4 of Series “Confusion in the elderly”.
One of a series about the techniques for management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. This demonstrates a variety of treatments of admission to hospital. Shows actual patients with different presentations of confusion, and outlines basic principles of management designed to allow the patients to get the most out of life.

results.title: Management in the community
results.brief_description:
Episode number 3 of Series “Confusion in the elderly”.
One of a series about the techniques for management and treatment of confusion in the elderly. Traces the case of an elderly woman whose family wants to have her committed to hospital or a home. However, with medical advice it is possible for her to remain at home.

group_works.title: Would you kiss a naked man? (TEFC)
group_works.creator_credit: R. Alan Gough, Mary McLeod and Northern Century Productions

results.title: Would you kiss a naked man? (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: R. Alan Gough, Mary McLeod and Northern Century Productions
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Concepts in sexuality”.
Demonstrates that sexuality and nudity are a natural part of an honest relationship between two people who care for one another by presenting a dramatized interlude between two teenagers in which they discuss the meaning of their relationship and engage in sexual play. From the series “Concepts in Sexuality”.
results.creator_credit_for_label: R. Alan Gough, Mary McLeod and Northern Century Productions

results.title: Weight and circuit training (TEFC)
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Nicholas Cockram, Bruce Moir and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode no. 3 of Series “Conditioning for Sport”
Describes many specific exercises and training and condition techniques necessary for those interested in weight training. Weight training is a proven method for athletes to develop strength, power and muscular endurance, so it differs from weight lifting which emphasises strength and firm body building.

results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conditioning for Sport”.
Gives an insight into the specific exercises, training and conditioning techniques necessary for proficiency in running. Describes how the body adjusts to new levels of achievement with the proper training.

results.title: General principles
results.creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Nicholas Cockram, South Australian Film Corporation and Slater Sound Studios
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Conditioning for Sport”.
Gives an insight into some of the specific exercises and conditioning techniques necessary for the athlete to achieve his best. Illustrates various sports with particular emphasis on track and field events.
